alert.note: Alert for Coastal Galveston; Coastal Harris; Fort Bend; Inland Brazoria; Inland Galveston; Inland Harris (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 1:46PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will bring heavy rain to portions of northwestern Galveston, east central Fort Bend, northeastern Brazoria and southeastern Harris Counties through 215 PM CDT... At 142 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over South Houston, moving north at 5 mph. This storm has produced 1 to 2 inches of rainfall so far, with 2 to 4 inches total possible. HAZARD...Heavy Rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Localized street flooding possible. Locations impacted include... Pasadena, Pearland, League City, eastern Missouri City, Friendswood, Deer Park, Alvin, South Houston, Bellaire, West University Place, Galena Park, Jacinto City, Webster, Manvel, Hunters Creek Village, Bunker Hill Village, Piney Point Village, Cloverleaf, Downtown Houston and Greenway / Upper Kirby Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH

area.areaDesc: Coastal Galveston; Coastal Harris; Fort Bend; Inland Brazoria; Inland Galveston; Inland Harris
